LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.label: shell shock
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.description: a psychological disturbance caused by prolonged exposure to active warfare, especially being under bombardment
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.3.label: serious
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.4.label: catatonic
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.5.label: extreme
